resources.string: If you reject permission, you can not use this service \nPlease turn on permissions at [Setting] > [Permission]
To Call Phone allow # to access your call or phones.
To Capture photos and videos allow # to access your photos or videos.\nTap Settings > Permissions, and turn Camera on.
To discover veterinarian, para-vet, shopkeeper around you, allow Pashupal access to your location.Tap Settings > Permissions, and turn Location on
# does not have access to your Storage. To enable access,\n\nTap Settings > Permissions and turn Storage on.
Write External Storage permission allows us to manage images for your. Please allow this permission in App Settings
# does not have access to this permission. To enable access,Tap Settings > Permissions and turn on required permission.
